programme.title: To Love A Cripple
programme.desc: When Collins falls in love with Blessing, his mother becomes so enraged, she injures Blessing and leaves her disabled. Will Collins learn the truth and help Blessing?

programme.title: Wedding Ring
programme.desc: Zara and Benjamins best could not stand seeing them together as husband and wife, so he did the unimaginable.

programme.title: Akunna
programme.desc: Agidi and Oforie have a great bond as friend built on love, trust and care, but on the other side of the story, the wife of Oforie has a secret to keep.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nwoye leaves Mgberi, Adanna and Nnanna face a surprising new revelation.

programme.title: My Servant
programme.desc: All the princesses in a palace wants the cook Benji, for keeps, but all hell break loose when the king finds out that he has gotten his three daughters pregnant.

programme.title: Secret Of A Queen
programme.desc: After the sacrifice, a virgin is held back and not return to her kingdom. It is revealed that she can not marry another man after carrying the pot of sacrifice. Will the kingdom be ok?

programme.title: Hot Box Of Chocolate
programme.desc: A graduate who could not find a job eventually gets a job working as a house help with a family, but she is not love by all. She eventually gets her dreams come through.

programme.title: The Cook
programme.desc: Lawson falls in love with Zimchi, this angered the four other ladies in Lawsons life. Now that he has decided to marry, but it can no longer work because of Zimchis mother.

programme.title: Innocence Between Walls
programme.desc: Dimitri is about to let out all secrets as Mrs. Elizabeth is killed in her apartment and all fingers points to Abigail, Mrs. Elizabeth daughter.

programme.title: Beyond The Brink
programme.desc: Ikenes love for Adora, a blind woman, faces fierce opposition from his family. But just when it seems impossible, a twist changes everything forever.

programme.title: When Love Lies
programme.desc: Chiamanda is labelled a witch after a series of men die following their marriages to her. However, her story is about to take a turn when she meets Obinna.

programme.title: Jack And Kiki
programme.desc: Jack and Kiki troubles the entire village until their aunt comes to take them to the city, but they will put their stubbornness to use as they expose their aunts husband.

programme.title: Wedding Tears
programme.desc: Dagogo wants his son Morgan to marry a psycho because of his political ambition, but the story is about to change as he meets an illiterate and falls in love with her.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Arunma gets a new position, and Ijeawele confesses. Ejike faces the King of Ajaani.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nnanna refuses to give up on Adanna. Ojigijaga remains steadfast in his demand, and Nwoye is protected by the gods.

programme.title: Love Everlasting
programme.desc: Vivian is a career woman, busy and unable to make her love life blossom as she barely has time for it. She becomes heartbroken by her man and best friend, and that single act changes all.

programme.title: Echieteka
programme.desc: A young man is chosen to be the oracle of his community, but his mother, fearing the gods demands, prevents him from accepting his role and leads him to another faith.

programme.title: His Choice
programme.desc: An older sister always allows her younger sister to have her way. Things take a dramatic turn when the man she loves falls in love with her older sister instead.

programme.title: Hunted House
programme.desc: Sir Bamako will do anything to bring Adaeze into the Haunted house, just for him to replenish his wealth and powers.

programme.title: Out Of Line
programme.desc: Prince Charles frustrates all guards assign to him because he is hard to please, time changes as the king employs Ifeoma, a female guard to protect him.

programme.title: Our Love Story
programme.desc: When Chiefs affair shatters his family, his daughter Jenny must navigate love, secrets, and betrayal to decide if forgiveness is possible.

programme.title: As It Seems
programme.desc: A local bus driver sees a lady through school with his life savings, will she eventually stay with him?

programme.title: Forever And A Day
programme.desc: Frank is obsess with Olivia that he couldnt take his eyes off her and follows her everywhere. His obsession takes a dark turn when she starts a relationship with someone.

programme.title: Wrong Man

programme.title: Fast and Furious 9
programme.desc: Having escaped the clutches of Charlize Theron, Dom and the crew are now faced with the emergence of his estranged brother, played by John Cena, in this exciting ninth instalment.

programme.title: Spiral From The Book Of Saw
programme.desc: This Saw spin-off adds a new twist while keeping the franchises brutality. Detective Zeke Banks (Chris Rock) tries to track down a Jigsaw copycat killer who targets cops.

programme.title: The Goldfinch
programme.desc: A book-inspired drama about a young boy who lost his mother in a terrorist attack. He has a coveted painting stolen before the tragedy as a memento of his mothers death.

programme.title: Blinding Lights
programme.desc: A young aspiring female singer struggling with addiction wants to make it big in the Atlanta music scene. She decides to overcome the strikes she has against her family.

programme.title: The Ex Obsession
programme.desc: An accidental death leads to stolen identity when a woman coerces her husband to assume her dead exs identity. Their desperate cover-up spirals into obsession.

programme.title: All Saints Christmas
programme.desc: A delightful holiday movie. When a popular RandB singers picture of her and her ex is misinterpreted as an engagement, her family insists he joins her on her trip back home.

programme.title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now...
programme.sub-title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now I Feel Kinda Left Out
programme.desc: A sci-fi comedy. A teen girl helps her space-obsessed neighbour to find his parents, whom aliens might have abducted.

programme.title: The Nutcracker And The Magic Flute
programme.desc: The classic Nutcracker tale gets a refreshing twist. As Marie wishes to escape her troubles, she shrinks to the size of her toys, which all come to life.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: This adorable animation with an ensemble cast explores the world inside our phones, where emojis live and one multi-expressional emoji heads off on an adventure to discover his purpose.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: An exciting animated adventure. An encounter with a Yeti, targeted by a rich man, sets teenage Yi and her two friends on an adventure to return the magical creature to his home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: When the murderous Lord Shen threatens China with a terrifying new weapon, Po must face a truth he never expected and defeat Shen for the good of Kung Fu.

programme.title: Muzzle
programme.desc: In this action movie, Aaron Eckhart takes on the criminal underworld. While investigating his partners murder, an LAPD K-9 officer uncovers a vast conspiracy.

programme.title: Copshop
programme.desc: Gerard Butler leads a great ensemble cast in this action thriller. A wily con artist running from an assassin devises a scheme to hide inside a small-town police station.

programme.title: The Hitmans Bodyguard
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds and Sam Jackson dive headfirst into action for this chaotic comedy. A low-level bodyguard reluctantly agrees to protect a crazy hitman with valuable testimony.

programme.title: Hitmans Wifes Bodyguard
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds and Samuel L. Jackson return as Michael and Darius respectively. The two continue their friendship as they try to save Darius wife, Sonia (Salma Hayek).

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: Emmy-winning actor Bob Odenkirk leads this action thriller as an unassuming man who is driven to the edge after a home invasion. He goes into a rage to protect his family.

programme.title: Black Warrant
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Tom Berenger stars in this action-packed thriller. A semi-retired assassin and DEA agent team up to stop a cyber terrorist organisation.

programme.title: Deadly DILF
programme.desc: A compelling thriller. A harmless flirtation between a college girl and the hot dad next door turns deadly when she becomes obsessed with him and tries to destroy his marriage.

programme.title: Prisoner Of Love
programme.desc: Inspired by a real-life romantic crime story. A corrections officer falls in love with an inmate and helps him break him out of jail.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Gary Oldman won the Oscar for his portrayal of iconic British Prime Minister Winston Churchill in this biopic. During WWII, he debates whether to negotiate with Hitler or fight on.

programme.title: My Sweet Monster
programme.desc: An animated musical for the family. Princess Barbara flees her wedding and meets a sweet monster and his pal, who help save her kingdom from an evil postman.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: John Goodman, Rosie ODonnell and a great cast bring this cartoon classic to life. Fred gets an executive position at his company, but he soon learns that money isnt everything.

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: The beloved cartoon character gets his own comedy. When a documentary filmmaker arrives at Jellystone Park to shoot a project, she quickly crosses paths with the infamous Yogi Bear.

programme.title: Nanny Mcphee And The Big Bang
programme.desc: Oscar winner Emma Thompson writes and stars in this fun family film. A mysterious nanny arrives to help a struggling mom with her kids and the farm while their father is at war.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Rogue
programme.desc: Bruce Willis propels this action film. After they shoot his partner, a veteran detective pursues a group of thieves from LA to New York but soon finds his past conflicting with his case.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Tom Cruise messes with forces unknown in this reboot. While trying to steal artefacts in the Middle East, a soldier accidentally awakens an ancient, malevolent princess.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Oscar winner Matt Damon reprises his role as the CIAs most dangerous former operative. Hes on a mission to uncover more truths about his past in this explosive action-thriller.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: A revenge-filled thriller driven by Jason Statham. A former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers is on a brutal campaign for vengeance.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Not many films rival the visual spectacle of Christopher Nolans sci-fi epic. Leonardo DiCaprio and a stellar cast enter peoples dreams to steal corporate secrets.

programme.title: Zone 414
programme.desc: Guy Pearce drives this sci-fi thriller as a private investigator tasked with finding a tech billionaires missing daughter. He teams up with an advanced AI to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Dead Trigger: Unkilled
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic film that sees an elite soldier unit stepping in to save humanity when a virus decimates the world and creates zombie hordes.

programme.title: Blockers
programme.desc: Three parents try to stop their daughters from losing their virginity on prom night.

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: They say that opposites attract, at least for one intoxicated evening, but several pregnancy tests later, Ben and Alison are lead on a funny and heart-warming journey in parenthood.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Dale and Kurt decide to become their own bosses by launching their own business. But a slick investor soon pulls the rug out from under them.

programme.title: Heath Ledger: A Tragic Tale
programme.desc: The tragedy of Heath Ledgers death has led to endless rumours and speculation about depression, hard-partying, and madness brought on by his role in the Dark Knight.

programme.title: Year One
programme.desc: When a couple of lazy hunter-gatherers are banished from their primitive village, they set off on an epic journey through the ancient world.

programme.title: Jamie Foxx: Secret To Success
programme.desc: A comprehensive look at the life and career of veteran actor Jamie Foxx. From starting out in comedy to Oscar wins and nominations, Foxxs career has been nothing short of success.

programme.title: Runaway Bride
programme.desc: A cynical, big-city newspaper columnist is eager to write about small-town, wedding-bolter Maggie Carpenter. But the more he finds out about skittish Maggie, the more he falls in love.

programme.title: Night At The Museum
programme.desc: Ben Stiller plays the new night guard at the Natural History Museum who discovers that when the visitors go home, the real adventure begins, as the museums exhibits come to life.

programme.title: Night At The Museum: Battle Of The...
programme.sub-title: Night At The Museum: Battle Of The Smithsonian
programme.desc: Larry Daley returns, but this time the museum and the adventure are even bigger, as he tries to rescue some old friends.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Movie Room offers entertaining local and international movies 24/7, from blockbuster hits to unforgettable cinema classics. Its diversity caters for every mood.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancee in response.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: A woolly mammoth loner with a tragic past joins a wisecracking sloth and a scheming saber-toothed tiger on a perilous journey to reunite a one-year-old boy with his hunter father.

programme.title: Playing With Fire
programme.desc: A crew of rugged firefighters meet their match when attempting to rescue three rambunctious kids.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out...

programme.desc: The Turtles get into another battle with their enemy the Shredder, who has acquired new allies.

programme.desc: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.s Greek Theater.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: After his wife and family are killed, G Man Frank Castle takes it upon himself to rid America of crime by acting as judge, jury and executioner.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Hardened convicts and smoking-hot navigators race tricked-out cars in the most twisted sport on Earth! This thrill ride keeps you pinned to your seat.

programme.title: Houseguest
programme.desc: In hot water with the mob over an unpaid debt, a con man poses as a family friend in an affluent Pennsylvania suburb.

programme.title: Jamie Foxx: Secret To Success
programme.desc: A comprehensive look at the life and career of veteran actor Jamie Foxx. From starting out in comedy to Oscar wins and nominations, Foxxs career has been nothing short of success.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise Of Cobra
programme.desc: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation

programme.title: Jiu Jitsu
programme.desc: When the Earth is threatened by an alien warrior, a wise-cracking jiu jitsu trainer helps an injured master fighter prepare for the ultimate battle.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an aging elite assassin, adjusting to his retirement, who suddenly finds himself chased by a killer able to predict his every move.

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption
programme.desc: A retired mobster seeks redemption but faces betrayal and vengeance in a deadly game of loyalty and revenge in this spellbinder.

programme.title: What Happens In Miami
programme.desc: What should be a fun spring break quickly becomes a nightmare for a group of teens when they end up in the frame for a friends disappearance.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of the best action movies. In each episode, youll get all the secrets straight from your favourite action heroes.

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: After a young boy destroys an ant colony, he is shrunk down to size by the disgruntled insects until he learns the error of his ways.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: A young girl manages to will the amusement park of her dreams into a reality, only to find it is under threat. Can she and her animal pals save it?

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A young Viking from a clan of fierce dragon-slayers changes the lives of everyone around him when he decides to befriend an injured dragon.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out Of...
programme.sub-title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out Of Water
programme.desc: Chaos ensues in Bikini Bottom after Plankton tries to steal the Krabby Patty Secret Formula. Its down to SpongeBob and his pals to get it back.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: A foster kid living with her mean foster mother sees her life change when New York City mayoral candidate Will Stacks makes a campaign move.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: The gift of obedience given to Ella by a fairy turns out to be more like a curse, forcing her to do whatever people tell her.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part III
programme.desc: A ruthless businessman vows revenge on Daniel and Mr Miyagi.

programme.title: Bad Boys For Life
programme.desc: Two Miami detectives deal with their midlife crises while taking on a ruthless drug cartel.

programme.title: Why Did I Get Married?
programme.desc: Screen adaptation of Perrys stage play about the trials of marriage, and what happens to one family when a sexy young temptress arrives on the scene.

programme.title: The Cold Light Of Day
programme.desc: A father and son unwittingly find themselves at the centre of a global web of secrets and violence, amid the hunt for a mysterious stolen briefcase.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: Dwayne The Rock Johnson stars as a mercenary hired to destroy the evil ruler Memnon who is protected by the visions of a beautiful sorceress.

programme.title: Riot
programme.desc: Riot delves into the gritty underworld of a dystopian city where a rogue detective battles corruption, fighting the treacherous and more for justice.

programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of the best action movies. In each episode, youll get all the secrets straight from your favourite action heroes.
